snippet.title: GeoDepths - Release Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
GeoDepths is an indie game that I am developing in Unity. The game is centred around you piloting a drill machine through the ground, mining and smelting metal ore. It's a resource management game with some mystery and adventure via cave exploration. With sprinkles of automation, research, power management, farming, and discovery. Find logs from previous explorers, and uncover an alien mystery.

Releasing 20-10-23.
Wishlist the game to be notified on release!

- Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2206140/GeoDepths/
- ItchIO: https://a-little-more-games.itch.io/geodepths

Checkout the dev log series to witness its development journey: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLOmypIsKoxbXpnwWbWQSDIiaHxRNlIwC7

- Website: https://alittlemoregames.com.au/
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/LittleMoreGames
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/alittlemoregames/
- Discord Server: http://discord.gg/tv9XvXB5n6
- Email: alittlemoregames@gmail.com
